languages.text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects on enemies will deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Every burning enemy in combat immediately suffers damage.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects on enemies will deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Every burning enemy in combat immediately suffers damage.

languages.text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} enemy in combat immediately suffers damage. Until the end of combat, burning effects deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.
languages.original_text: Все враги с эффектом {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} в бою немедленно получают урон. До конца боя все эффекты горения наносят врагам на {uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} больше.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} enemy in combat immediately suffers damage. Until the end of combat, burning effects deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} enemy in combat immediately suffers damage. Until the end of combat, burning effects deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя все эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, действующие на врагов, наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} больше. Все враги с эффектом горения в бою немедленно получают урон.

До конца боя все эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, действующие на врагов, наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} больше. Все враги с эффектом горения в бою немедленно получают урон.

languages.text: Jeder im Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennende{/g} Gegner erleidet sofort Schaden. Bis zum Ende des Kampfes fügt der Verbrennen-Effekt Gegnern +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} enemy in combat immediately suffers damage. Until the end of combat, burning effects deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text: Jeder im Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennende{/g} Gegner erleidet sofort Schaden. Bis zum Ende des Kampfes fügt der Verbrennen-Effekt Gegnern +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.

languages.text: Tous les ennemis victimes de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} subissent des dégâts immédiats. Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les effets de Combustion infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires aux ennemis.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} enemy in combat immediately suffers damage. Until the end of combat, burning effects deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text: Tous les ennemis victimes de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} subissent des dégâts immédiats. Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les effets de Combustion infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires aux ennemis.

languages.text: 战斗中每个受到{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果影响的敌人都会立刻承受燃烧伤害，燃烧效果对敌人造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517}点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} enemy in combat immediately suffers damage. Until the end of combat, burning effects deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text: 战斗中每个受到{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果影响的敌人都会立刻承受燃烧伤害，燃烧效果对敌人造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517}点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Todas las criaturas que estén {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiendo{/g} en combate sufren daño inmediatamente. Hasta el final del combate, todos los efectos de estar ardiendo infligen +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} enemy in combat immediately suffers damage. Until the end of combat, burning effects deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text: Todas las criaturas que estén {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiendo{/g} en combate sufren daño inmediatamente. Hasta el final del combate, todos los efectos de estar ardiendo infligen +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘中のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上状態{/g}敵は、即座にダメージを受ける。戦闘終了まで、炎上効果が敵に与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517}増加する。
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} enemy in combat immediately suffers damage. Until the end of combat, burning effects deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上状態{/g}敵は、即座にダメージを受ける。戦闘終了まで、炎上効果が敵に与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517}増加する。

languages.text: Çatışmada {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanan{/g} her düşman anında hasara mazur kalır. Yanma etkileri, çatışma sonuna dek düşmanlara +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} enemy in combat immediately suffers damage. Until the end of combat, burning effects deal +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text: Çatışmada {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanan{/g} her düşman anında hasara mazur kalır. Yanma etkileri, çatışma sonuna dek düşmanlara +{uip|DamageBonus|24f1e49a2294434da2dc17edb6808517} daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
